query:
UPDATE ohlc_candles
                    SET stable = false
                    WHERE time IN (
                        SELECT time FROM ohlc_candles
                        WHERE time <= $1
                        ORDER BY time DESC
                        LIMIT 5
                    )
                    OR time IN (
                        SELECT time FROM ohlc_candles
                        WHERE time > $1
                        ORDER BY time ASC
                        LIMIT 5
                    )
